fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Train your pet rock to do various things during the day. They gain the ability of a random Rock role.
- Train your pet rock to do mean things. They gain the ability of a random Rock role, which is guaranteed to be a kill capable ability. 1 use.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When your pet rock has a learned ability, you can throw your pet rock at someone. Your pet rock will use the selected ability on that player.
- Yes, your pet rock can have multiple abilities learned at once, because it is smarter than Albert Eistein.
